title: Experiential Learning of Indonesian History and Culture Using Student Broadcasting

context.prior_knowledge: Basic History Learning Experience and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Collaboration and microlearning environments using personal devices (BYOD), with practical skill enhancement through media production technology acquisition.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain five or more major historical events and cultural characteristics of Indonesia
Learners can produce videos introducing Indonesian culture by applying the student broadcast production process (planning-filming-editing)
Learners can effectively convey learning content by utilizing news reporting, material editing, and presentation skills during video production
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
